# Sample Media URLs for Testing
# Use these URLs in the Testing tab to test media functionality

## Images
https://picsum.photos/800/600
https://picsum.photos/400/300
https://via.placeholder.com/800x600/0066CC/FFFFFF?text=Sample+Image
https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/FF6600/FFFFFF?text=Test+Image

## Videos
https://sample-videos.com/zip/10/mp4/SampleVideo_1280x720_1mb.mp4
https://sample-videos.com/zip/10/mp4/SampleVideo_640x360_1mb.mp4
https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4

## Audio
https://www.soundjay.com/misc/sounds/bell-ringing-05.wav
https://www.soundjay.com/misc/sounds/fail-buzzer-02.wav

## Documents
https://www.w3.org/WAI/ER/tests/xhtml/testfiles/resources/pdf/dummy.pdf
https://www.learningcontainer.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/sample-pdf-file.pdf

## Notes
- These are public test URLs that should work for testing
- Some URLs may be temporary or have bandwidth limits
- For production use, use your own media files
- Always respect copyright and terms of service
